website_summaries.verdict: A great option for those needing a lightweight jacket for the fall and summer months.
pros: No hood for comfortable and hassle-free wear
Customers appreciated the roomy fit, especially in the arms and shoulders
cons: Jacket color is not true to online pictures

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about the jacket except the standing collar- it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the jacket except the standing collar- it seems about an inch too tall but maybe that's just me. The sides of the collar don't seem to stand or hang symmetrically, so depending on how far up you zip the sides may be drooping or standing in different ways. Not a huge deal, but it's noticeable. I'm 6'-0 and 210 and went with a large based on prior reviews and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: K.J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased myself one of these and four more for Christmas presents. Everyone love it, including me. Wonderful looking jacket that's the perfect weight for winters in the South. Very comfortable and provides just the right amount of warmth. Excellent fit!
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This middle-weight jacket has cool, blue piping, three outside pockets, and sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: John G. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want to SMELL Like a Homeless person
customer_reviews.text: SMELL Like a Homeless person. I'm not the kind of person who washes their jacket each time I wear it. I wash them often but not after each time. There is something about the material in this jacket that makes sweet rot when you wear it once. The jacket doesn't breath like normal materials. The next time you wear it, you smell like a homeless person. I do wear this jacket, but now the moment I take it off it goes in the washer not in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: BlueSky

customer_reviews.title: Front Zipper too flimsy keeps jamming
customer_reviews.text: We were huge fans of everything Columbia produced up until now. The front zipper on this jacket is too fragile and flimsy and keeps jamming. After just a few days of wear we had to send the jacket back because the front zipper jammed so severely at the bottom that we could not re seat or re track the zipper to be able to use the jacket at all. This jacket needs a heavier duty zipper to be able to prevent these types of jams and locking up. Perhaps a heavier or better quality zipper would enable the user to re seat or re track the zipper on the user's end.
customer_reviews.author: Rfinnshw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 40-60 degree weather for going to work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at a retail store and its great for 40-60 degree weather. I like it a lot because it looks great with pretty much any color of dress pants. (I have the gray color). Very similar yet fits the body well. I usually wear medium shirts, but bought a small because it fit me pretty much perfect - almost like a shirt - therefore keeps the heat in even better. There are 3 front pockets that do not stand out and all have zippers. Great jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Melo Hall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but colors are off
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift. I got the small size because I'm 5'7 and usually wear medium shirts but small jackets. I typically wear a tshirt, sweater, and hoodie under this jacket and still have some room left over. A very light lining inside adds some warmth and the waterproof outer layer keeps the wind out. My only negative about the jacket is the color. I got the deep woods color because the picture makes it look like a dark grey. It is actually a dark green in real life. Highly recommend the jacket but also highly recommend taking a look at the colors in real life before making a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Buying a Black one next!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy !! And warmer than you would think. Working at a dealership going in and out from the Cold to hot climates you can ever have a small jacket or a big puffy jacket this Columbia fits right in the middle of light and Heavy. Warm enough for them Chicago cold days and warm enough to be inside. Got it embroid with our logo as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Great wind breaker. When it is colder, I wear it over an insulating jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Print Is Alive

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket...but...
customer_reviews.text: Fits and looks great, but zipper keeps failing (opens up) - could do with a more robust closure (metal, maybe?)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fit of this jacket could not be any better. It feels top quality looks top quality and ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit of this jacket could not be any better. It feels top quality looks top quality and works very well. Keeps rain off, I use it during summer and winter as It isn't too thick to be uncomfortable, but keep warmth in when I need it to. Excellent jacket for sure. As a snowboarder I will be trying this out for the first time this winter. The zippers being water proof will be good for the snow. Wearing it underneath thicker layers works out because it keeps heat in.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wiegand

customer_reviews.title: "Omni-wind" did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: The style of the jacket is oversized for layering, but I wore this jacket to an outdoor event and it was a very cool day. If the sun was out without the wind, you were cool, but comfortable. If the wind was blowing, it cut right thru the jacket. Needless to say, but I was miserable for most of the day, because the I feel like the "Omni-Wind" technology did not do it's job for the reason it was purchased.
customer_reviews.author: ObjectiveAdvice

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me so comfortable and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me so comfortable and warm! A big fan of Columbia merchandise and this one is yet again another absolute statement of the excellent quality of their products!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Reiss

customer_reviews.title: Great light jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jacket, color and fit was as expected. The color "Carbon" would indicate dark gray or almost black, but the color of the jacket was pretty close to the picture for "Carbon" on the web site.
customer_reviews.author: GEMCAD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this jacket. Fits me well and is comfy.

product_meta.title: Columbia Men's Ascender Softshell Jacket
product_meta.description: The perfect compromise between blizzard in the forecast and first chill of fall, this multi-functional soft-shell works hard and plays even harder. It's made from rich, supple soft-shell with all the comfort of a heavy sweatshirt and the weather-fighting prowess of a hard-shell jacket. Rugged, warm, durable—and yet decidedly presentable, this wind- and water-resistant softshell jacket is a versatile, all-season piece with an impeccable fit built to keep you protected in milder weather and layer under shells and jackets for bonus warmth in more severe conditions.
feature_bullets: ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY: This men's softshell jacket is crafted of soft water and wind resistant material to keep you warm and protected during cold and wet days outside.
HANDY FEATURES: This men's water and wind resistant jacket features two hand zippered pockets and zippered chest pocket. It also features a high neck to keep protected from chilly outside air.
ADJUSTABLE FEATURES: A zippered front creates an adjustable level of warmth.
With 100% polyester Contour Softshell fabric this jacket is versatile and soft.
Columbia's Unisex Thermarator Fleece Neck Gaiter is a must-have to keep your ears and neck warm and protected when the cold winter air seems unforgiving.
